short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NucleusLinks Extension for Chrome - simplify affiliate merchant link creation from standard web URLs with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NucleusLinks Extension for Chrome helps editorial teams convert standard web URLs into customized affiliate links with a single click.

+ Generate a universal affiliate link that can be easily managed from your NucleusLinks console.
+ No need to spend countless hours juggling between separate Chrome extensions for each affiliate network.

‚ùóPlease note: You need to have an existing NucleusLinks account and be logged in for NucleusLinks Extension to be active.

Create your NucleusLinks account here: https://console.nucleuslinks.ai/register
 
VERSION 3.0.1 NEW UPDATES
+ One Click: Faster monetizable link creation as the process has been reduced from 2-clicks to a single click.
+ Custom Domain: Include a brand name to affiliate links to make them appear more legitimate, allowing users to click on the links without any reservations.
+ Additional Parameters: Configure parameters to capture deep insights at the Author, Source, Category, and Article level.
+ Link Shortener: Reduce the length of affiliate links to make them aesthetically appealing and shareable on social media posts and other webpages.
+ Switch: NucleusLinks users can seamlessly move between their Smart Buttons and Smart Redirects accounts with a single click.
+ History: Quick eDiscovery of all affiliate links created to date in one place.
 
üöÄ KEY FEATURES
+ Effortless Link Generation: Create NucleusLinks tracking URLs from any web URLs without breaking a sweat.
+ Operational Efficiency: Avoid multiple extensions to manage affiliate links ‚Äî one extension to rule them all!
+ Easy Copy-Paste: Copy the NucleusLinks tracking URL and paste it into the CMS dashboard for seamless user redirection from the content site.
+ Zero Learning Curve: Simple interface to get seasoned and non-tech savvy users up and running in a jiffy.
 
üìå GET STARTED
+ Register: Sign up as a NucleusLinks user and configure preferred merchants on the NucleusLinks console based on your affiliate partnerships. Sign up here: https://console.nucleuslinks.ai/register
+ Download: Search and install the NucleusLinks Extension from the Google Chrome Web Store. Share our Chrome webstore link: https://bit.ly/3WJRxVl
+ Log in to NucleusLinks Extension: Use your NucleusLinks login details to access the extension and start generating monetizable links instantly.

Still not sure? Send your query to support@nucleuslinks.ai and our dedicated support team will make sure to get back to you promptly.
